name: Open face (ambient)
description: sampling of particles without size cut-off at ambient temperature and relative humidity

name: Open face (heated)
description: sampling of particles without size cut-off at elevated temperature and therefore reduced relative humidity (normally <40% RH)

name: PM10 (ambient)
description: sampling of particles with size cut-off at 10 µm at ambient temperature and relative humidity

name: PM10 (heated)
description: sampling of particles with size cut-off at 10 µm  at elevated temperature and therefore reduced relative humidity (normally <40% RH)

name: PM2.5 (ambient)
description: sampling of particles with size cut-off at 2.5 µm at ambient temperature and relative humidity

name: PM2.5 (heated)
description: sampling of particles with size cut-off at 2.5 µm at elevated temperature and therefore reduced relative humidity (normally <40% RH)

name: PM1 (ambient)
description: sampling of particles with size cut-off at 1 µm at ambient temperature and relative humidity

name: PM1 (heated)
description: sampling of particles with size cut-off at 1 µm at elevated temperature and therefore reduced relative humidity (normally <40% RH)
